abstract: Cisco, a bellwether stock for the technology industry, reported that net income in its third quarter declined 5.4 percent, to $1.8 billion, but that revenue rose 10 percent.
snippet: Cisco, a bellwether stock for the technology industry, reported that net income in its third quarter declined 5.4 percent, to $1.8 billion, but that revenue rose 10 percent.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Cisco Systems to Wall Street: It’s not so bad.

headline.main: Cisco Sales Top Lowered Forecast, and Profit Declines
headline.print_headline: Cisco Sales Top Lowered Forecast, and Profit Declines

abstract: In its effort to crack down on people who are very heavy users of file sharing systems, Comcast is considering limiting the bandwidth use of its Internet customers. But the limit it is proposing — 250 gigabytes — is so large it would allow users to watch 11 hours of Internet video each day.

lead_paragraph: Not all limits are unreasonable. If I told my nine-year-old that from now on, she would be allowed no more than 16 cookies a day, I’d get a glassy-eyed “Whatever.”
